TopicTitle: anyone please tell me which easter egg(s) is gonna get removed?

Articles.Content:
i know the abandoned plane hangar will be gone; how about the others?

Edited July 23, 2013 by lammatt

The abandoned hanger isn't gone but they'd mucked up the terrain a fair bit, hopefully they fix it.

The old parts easter egg that was with it seemed gone. But this was only in the preview version.

I hope they fix both of these.
I don't think they ever intentionally remove easter eggs. It's generally unintentional.
Be nice if they introduced a few more, though I've only found a couple of the original ones.
Do easter eggs benefit you in anyway or are they just accomplishments to do?

Do easter eggs benefit you in anyway or are they just accomplishments to do?

If you touch the monolith north of the launch pad, you suddenly know how to use new technology. Or at least know how to use an antelope femur to whoop Jebediah upside the head when he annoys you.
Looks like the Island Airport will be back...
